::: Within an hour of the transmission, Jackle and Black Aracnia joined Hell 
Beast, Megatron, Marine, and Zardus. They were now en route to the Maximal 
base. :::

::: Hell Beast, within the shade of the mirky woods from a soft 
rainfall, ::: Jackle, scout ahead and send the transmission to the Maximals. 
It will let them know were coming so they dont become alarmed.

:: Jackle nodded and transformed into his beast mode. He ran onward, his nose 
smelling the air and his ears alert. Within a few minutes he was out of sight 
and deep into the darkness of the forest. He went stright to the Maximals 
base. It was a large clearing, and settled around the ship was the volcano 
and the Ark. :::

::: He transformed and pulled out a transmitter. He punched in a few codes 
and sent the message. A large orb appeared and Hell Beast's head visualized:
    " Greetings Maximals, and who ever is in charge. I do belive it is Iron 
Raptor, but I could be mistaken. Liono, if he is even in the base, I want to 
tell you that Myself, Zardus, Megatron, and a few troops are on our way to 
your fortress. 
    This is not a warning or a threat. We are here to discuss the Newcomers 
and the possibility of an allience. Please, dont greet us with pistols. This 
is a mission of peace."

::: The message was sent. Now all he could do was wait. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set and Ra glared at the snow capped cliffs that they were perched on. 
They recevied a message from an informant who could give them stratigic 
information on the insides of both the Predacon and Allience bases. :::

::: Ra, in between shivers, in his beast mode. ::: Master Set....I-I-I dont 
think this informant is-is-is coming....

::: Set, wrapped in a thermal blanket, ::: He will come, if he dosent then I 
will level this artic desert.

::: Then there was silence until the sound of thrusters broke it. From the 
white sky came the metallic body of Ominous Prime. He set down, energon 
pistol in hand, and the tube of liquid energon in his chest cast a faint blue 
glow over the tundra :::

::: Ominous ::: I see the cold dosent suit you two. 

::: Set ::: No, it dosent. I suppose you'll be taking me to your lair now? 
Well, not likely, we will stay here, where we have the advantage.

::: Ominous, his cool red eyes locked on both figures who looked absolutely 
pathetic in the freezing cold. :::

::: Ominous ::: Fine stay. Ive adapted to the frost, and six months solid 
darkness. It suits me just fine. 

::: Ra, in disgust of the cold, ignites his flame wrists to warm his body. 
Ominous is spooked by this and fires of two blasts and sends the pheniox 
skidding across the snow, smoking. :::

::: Set didnt even glace back ::: I see your an excellent shot. A good 
fighter too I persume?

::: Ominous ::: Ask Hell Beast, he's the one who made me.

::: Set ::: Well, I was wondering what you were. You didnt seem to be any 
kind of transformer Ive seen.

::: THe conversation went on like this for near twenty minutes, and then they 
got to business. :::

::: Set ::: So, you can help my fraction?

::: Ominous ::: Yes, in exchange to total use of your futuristic labratory's 
and esources.

::: Set ::: Granted. Now, lets go to my base, we can talk more.

::: They picked up Ra, and took off. :::
